newsitem.title: USA: News Corp may sell HarperCollins - Variety.
newsitem.headline: News Corp may sell HarperCollins - Variety.

text.p: Rupert Murdoch's News Corp is moving toward an outright sale of its book-publishing unit HarperCollins, Daily Variety said.
In Thursday's edition, the publication cited Wall Street sources who said the openness to sell the unit is part of News Corp's effort to to rehabilitate its image on Wall Street.
While details are still sketchy, the most likely buyer is seen as Bertelsmann, owner of Bantam Doubleday, Variety said.
Neither News Corp nor Bantam Doubleday would comment Wednesday, although Bantam has said in recent weeks it is interested in acquiring a trade publishing house, the article said.
